info.title: Info/Impress
info.content:
Contact

News are distributed via the blog (in German).

You can post questions and suggestions via mail and myTwitter account . Additionally, I have set up fan pages at Google+ and Facebook .

You can report bugs at the map's github-page , where you can also find the complete source code.

Impress

Angaben gemäß § 5 TMG, Verantwortlich für den Inhalt nach § 55 Abs. 2 RStV:

Florian Pigorsch
Hurstbrunnenstraße 5
79117 Freiburg
mail@flopp.net

Hillshading Map Tiles tiles

The hillshading map tiles are generously provided by the OpenMapSurfer project of Heidelberg University unter the following copyright terms:
Map data © SRTM; ASTER GDEM is a product METI and NASA, Imagery GIScience Research Group @ Heidelberg University

Administrative Boundaries Map Tiles

The 'administrative boundaries' map tiles are generously provided by the OpenMapSurfer project of Heidelberg University unter the following copyright terms:
Map data © Openstreetmap contributors; Imagery GIScience Research Group @ Heidelberg University

Nature Protection Areas (Germany)

The data of german nature protection areas are provided by the Bundesamt für Naturschutz (Federal Agency for Nature Conservation) under the GeoNutzV law. Additionally, we have an explicit written permission.
The displayed data sets are merged by the Bundesamt für Naturschutz from data sets of the individual federal states. The Bundesamt für Naturschutz does not provide any warranty regarding the precision and correctness of the data.
On the website of the Bundesamt you can find an official map showing the protection areas.

Geocaching Data

The displayed geocaching data is gathered by the Opencaching-API (OKAPI) from the national Opencaching sites Opencaching.de, Opencaching.pl, Opencaching.nl, Opencaching.org.uk, Opencaching.us, Opencaching.ro and is subject to the associated data licenses.

Cookies

This site uses cookies to store the current map view (center, markers, lines, etc.) in order to be able to restore on a recurring visit. You can, of course, delete these cookies in your browser settings.

Piwik

This website uses Piwik, a web analytics open-source software. Piwik uses “cookies”, which are text files placed on your computer, to help the website analyze how users use the site. The information generated by the cookie about your use of the website will be stored on the server of the service provider in Germany. You may refuse the use of cookies by selecting the appropriate settings on your browser, however please note that if you do this you may not be able to use the full functionality of this website.

projection.title: Waypoint projectie
projection.content: Waypoint projection creates a new marker d meters away from the source marker with a bearing angle of β°
projection.error_bad_bearing:
Bad 'bearing' value: "%1".
Allowed values: floating point numbers between 0 and 360.
projection.error_bad_distance:
Bad 'distance' value: "%1".
Allowed values: floating point numbers ≥ 0.

permalink.title: Permalink
permalink.content:
The following URL links to the current view of Flopp's Map including all markers, lines and the selected map type. Copy (CTRL+C) the URL and share it with your friends!
Shorten runs the long URL through an URL shortener (goo.gl) an produces a shortened URL.

npa.title: Bescherm Natuur Gebied
npa.content:
German nature protection areas are shown as a green map overlay:


The data of german nature protection areas are provided by the Bundesamt für Naturschutz (Federal Agency for Nature Conservation) under the GeoNutzV law. Additionally, we have an explicit written permission.
The displayed data sets are merged by the Bundesamt für Naturschutz from data sets of the individual federal states. The Bundesamt für Naturschutz does not provide any warranty regarding the precision and correctness of the data.
On the website of the Bundesamt you can find an official map showing the protection areas.
npa.msg_no_npa: There is no nature protection area at the selected coordinates
npa.error: Error querying information about nature protection areas.
